channel.title: Item "Certer" (Like Miles, Niles, Giles in RSC and Stiles in RS)

item.title: Item "Certer" (Like Miles, Niles, Giles in RSC and Stiles in RS)
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

I want to add an item “certer”, I’m not sure which item I would like him to cert yet but can anyone tell me how to go about it? I’m using a delta source.

I thought something like

if(npcID == ####){ deleteItem(###, #); addItem(###, #); sM(" ____ has noted your ____"); }

The problem is with this that you could have none of the item and still get some of the item noted.
I thought about some kind of

But then it would only work if you had that exact amount of the item, can someone help me?

Read full topic
item.source: Item "Certer" (Like Miles, Niles, Giles in RSC and Stiles in RS)
